snippet.title: Rift of the NecroDancer - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Rift of the NecroDancer is coming to Nintendo Switch in 2023! Wishlist today: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/rift-of-the-necrodancer-switch/

The NecroDancer's back in a brand new rhythm game spinoff! Help Cadence navigate the modern world while repairing the rifts that have torn her life apart. Do rhythmic battle via rift mode, minigames, and boss battles! All to the beat of a brand new soundtrack from Danny Baranowsky & friends.

#RiftoftheNecroDancer #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/NintendoAmerica
Follow us on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/Nintendo
